greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerators of the rational sequence with e.g.f. (x/2)*(1+exp(-x))/(1-exp(-x)).
comment: Numerator of the Bernoulli number B_n, except B(1)=0.
A027641 is the main entry for this sequence, which is only a minor variation. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 29 2010.
This could formally be defined by building the arithmetic mean of the numerators in A164555(n) and A027641(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
mathematica: CoefficientList[egf, x]*Range[0, terms-1]! // Numerator (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jun 13 2017 *)
results.author: _Paul Curtz_, Apr 15 2010
